ConfigurationGroup.title: United Parcel Service
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The UPS Shipping Module

INSTALLED.title: Installed Status
INSTALLED.description: Tells if the module is installed or not

STATUS.title: Enable UPS Shipping
STATUS.description: Do you want to offer UPS shipping?

TAX_CLASS.title: Tax Class
TAX_CLASS.description: Use the following tax class on the shipping fee.

ZONE.title: Shipping Zone
ZONE.description: If a zone is selected, only enable this shipping method for that zone.

DISPLAY_ORDER.title: Display Order
DISPLAY_ORDER.description: Display Order. Lowest is displayed first.

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_PICKUP.title: UPS Pickup Method
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_PICKUP.description: How do you give packages to UPS? CC - Customer Counter, RDP - Daily Pickup, OTP - One Time Pickup, LC - Letter Center, OCA - On Call Air

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_PACKAGE.title: UPS Packaging?
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_PACKAGE.description: CP - Your Packaging, ULE - UPS Letter, UT - UPS Tube, UBE - UPS Express Box

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RES.title: Residential Delivery?
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RES.description: Quote for Residential (RES) or Commercial Delivery (COM)

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_HANDLING.title: Handling Fee
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_HANDLING.description: Handling fee for this shipping method.
